docs.snippet: A U.S. federal appeals court on Friday asked the Justice Department and the state of Washington to submit briefs on whether a larger panel of judges should decide if President Donald Trump's travel ban should remain on hold....
docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. federal appeals court on Friday asked the Justice Department and the state of Washington to submit briefs on whether a larger panel of judges should decide if President Donald Trump's travel ban should remain on hold.

headline.main: Appeals Court to Weigh Rehearing of Trump Travel Ban

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump acted well within his authority in issuing his executive order on immigration, Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton told a federal appeals court on Wednesday....

docs.snippet: Washington state’s attorney general has promised to uncover "what truly motivated" President Donald Trump's executive order on immigration, an approach that could prompt a rare public examination of how a U.S. president makes national securi...
docs.lead_paragraph: Washington state’s attorney general has promised to uncover "what truly motivated" President Donald Trump's executive order on immigration, an approach that could prompt a rare public examination of how a U.S. president makes national security decisions.

docs.snippet: The most consequential legal challenge to U.S. President Donald Trump's travel ban will proceed on two tracks in the next few days: in a U.S. appeals court vote in San Francisco and the Seattle courtroom of a federal judge....
docs.lead_paragraph: The most consequential legal challenge to U.S. President Donald Trump's travel ban will proceed on two tracks in the next few days: in a U.S. appeals court vote in San Francisco and the Seattle courtroom of a federal judge.

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump's travel ban already has harmed some of the nation's top universities, stranding students, faculty and scholars abroad and making foreign schools more attractive to some of the world's brightest students, lawyers for the lea...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump's travel ban already has harmed some of the nation's top universities, stranding students, faculty and scholars abroad and making foreign schools more attractive to some of the world's brightest students, lawyers for the learning institutions told a federal judge Monday.

docs.snippet: A Somali refugee who had been stuck in limbo after President Donald Trump temporarily banned refugee entries has arrived in Utah to meet his 2-year-old daughter for the first time and make a long-awaited reunion with his wife....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Somali refugee who had been stuck in limbo after President Donald Trump temporarily banned refugee entries has arrived in Utah to meet his 2-year-old daughter for the first time and make a long-awaited reunion with his wife.
